channel.title: Adding Permanent GFX to custom item?
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, So my question is I would like to add the [u]fly[/u] GFX to one of my custom items. It is a cape just encase you would like to know. I need to the stay in the GFX at all times. If someone could help me out with the code that would be great. Thank you all for your time.
Bobdabuilda1
edit: Its is delta source, just been modified alot. Also if someone could post the step to doing it and not just the code that would be greatly appreciated.
